Name: Rumba
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Review: To quote Embury, "Whoever thought up this snootful of liquid dynamite certainly liked his liquor hard!"
History: Recipe adapted from David Embury's classic book, The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks .
Nutrition: One serving of Rumba contains 189 calories
